jobDetail: We are seeking skilled and experienced Angular Developers to join our dynamic team. If you're a passionate individual with over 3 years of hands-on experience, a solid educational background, and expertise in the latest Angular techniques, We want to hear from you! It's a full-time onsite role.
jobResponsibilities: Develop, test, and deploy high-quality Angular applications.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies.
Troubleshoot, debug and optimize code for performance.
Participate in code reviews to maintain code quality standards.
Work closely with UX/UI designers to implement cutting-edge frontend solutions.
jobRequirements: Demonstrate proficiency in Angular development and a strong understanding of frontend technologies.
Effectively communicate across integrated channels, particularly with backend interfaces.
Collaborate interactively with cross-functional teams.
skillsAndexperience: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
Over 3 years of hands-on experience with Angular.
Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, and other frontend technologies Strong understanding of responsive design principles Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git).
Knowledge of frontend build tools and package managers (e.g., Webpack, npm).
Ability to write clean, modular, and maintainable code
Familiarity with RESTful APIs and integration
Excellent problem-solving

jobDetail: We are searching for a talented Dotnet Developer. This is a hands-on role that includes coding, debugging, testing and deployment. In addition, the position will require interfacing with other internal and external technology stakeholders. Proven experience as a Developer with backend and frontend responsibilities.
jobResponsibilities: At least 3-5 years of experience in latest Microsoft technology stacks (C#, .NET Core, Entity Framework) and software architecture design.
Strong understanding of .NET, C#. Angular.
Familiarity with website performance optimization and security.
Strong experience in web development using client end frameworks, MVC and Web API.
Proven experience in planning, execution and implementation of high-quality software projects.
Experience in client relationship management, project coordination and delivery management.
Frontend Frameworks expertise (such as React , Angular) are a plus.
jobRequirements: Demonstrate proficiency in .NET development and a strong understanding of backend technologies.
Communicate effectively with cross-functional teams, particularly with frontend developers and UI/UX designers.
Actively contribute to the improvement of effective processes for .NET development.
skillsAndexperience: Bachelor's in computer science/ Software Engineering.
2-3 years of relevant experience.
Good communication and team collaboration skills.
Knowledge of database systems and integration with .NET applications.
Conduct thorough testing and debugging to identify and fix issues promptly.

jobDetail: We are looking to hire skilled, curious and passionate SQA Engineers who wants to make a difference. The SQA Engineer steers dubizzle’s automated testing infrastructure in order to assure that the excellent quality, standard and practices are maintained for all our projects
jobResponsibilities: 3 plus years of experience in Software Quality Assurance (Tested Web and Mobile Apps)
Participate in all aspects of SDLC to advocate quality.
Write test cases based on business /technical requirements, use cases, and design documents.
Perform black box and white box testing and help coordinate the QA process by tracking defects, and managing release processes.
Develop and Execute Test scenarios and test cases.
Lead process improvements to provide improved quality assurance and reduction in testing cycle time.
jobRequirements: Possess strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a keen attention to detail.
Collaborate with developers to understand the technical aspects of software and identify potential areas of improvement in the testing process.
Contribute to the improvement of effective processes for software quality assurance.
Communicate with cross-functional teams to ensure a shared understanding of project requirements and quality standards.
skillsAndexperience: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Engineering or equivalent field.
3+ years of enterprise class QA experience focused on Automation.
Test experience of web apps, mobile apps and web services.
Understanding of manual Testing with latest trends and matrix's.
Experience with writing and maintaining test automation frameworks.
Strong working knowledge of SQL and Relational Databases.

jobDetail: The UI Designer will be responsible for creating wireframes, mockups, and prototypes for digital products and services. The UI Designer will also be responsible for implementing front-end development technologies and working with cross-functional teams to improve user experience (UX). The role allows onsite work.
jobResponsibilities: User Interface (UI) Design and Visual Design skills.
Experience in creating wireframes, mockups, and prototypes.
Experience with web/mobile app design.
Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams.
Develop user flows, information architecture, and interactive prototypes to demonstrate and validate design concepts.
Work closely with developers to ensure seamless implementation of user interfaces, providing guidance and support throughout the development process.
Identify and troubleshoot UX problems (e.g., responsiveness)
jobRequirements: Demonstrate a strong portfolio showcasing UI/UX design projects and a deep understanding of design principles.
Proficiency in design tools such as Sketch, Figma, Adobe XD, or similar.
Stay updated on industry trends, design tools, and best practices to continually enhance design skills.
Ability to work collaboratively and iteratively with a user-centered design approach.
skillsAndexperience: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Engineering or equivalent field.
Portfolio of UI/UX design work for both mobile and web platforms.
Experience in creating wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity designs.
Understanding of responsive design principles and mobile design best practices.
Good knowledge of Adobe Creative Suite, Figma, etc.

jobDetail: We are looking for a highly talented Jr. Frontend Developer to help accelerate our growing professional services business, with minimum 1 to 3 years of experience. The role includes delivering high-quality products that scale to millions of users, applying new industry trends, and challenging your peers to deliver results. The successful candidate will be working along-side other engineers and developers, along with project manager and product owner to facilitate the development and delivery of products.
jobResponsibilities: Lead the development of responsive and user-friendly web interfaces using the latest frontend technologies.
Architect and implement reusable, maintainable, and modular front-end code using modern JavaScript frameworks and libraries (e.g. Angular, React).
Work closely with backend developers to integrate frontend components with server-side logic.
Optimize website performance for speed and accessibility across all devices and browsers.
Lead the implementation of best practices for code quality, maintainability, and testing
Design pixel-perfect responsive UIs, emphasizing the adoption of common interface patterns for improved UX.
jobRequirements: Demonstrate innovative thinking and problem-solving skills.
Effectively communicate across integrated channels, particularly with backend interfaces.
Collaborate interactively with cross-functional teams.
skillsAndexperience: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
Minimum 1 to 3 years of professional experience in frontend development.
Solid knowledge and experience with at least one modern Javascript framework such as Angular, React, etc.
Proficient in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and JavaScript frameworks.
Experience with building responsive and mobile-first websites
Solid understanding of UX/UI principles and best practices.
Experience with version control systems and build tools
